main.name: Anthony's Demo Project
main.description: I am a Sales Engineer and I enjoy learning about new technology and further developing myself. This GitHub hosted site demostrates my ability to quickly ramp up on new skillsets, React in this example.
main.bio: With over 10 years of Sales Engineering experience in the SaaS ecosystem, there's always something new to learn and I genuinely enjoy problem solving. In my personal time I like to create healthy recipes, workout, and practice Ashtanga style yoga.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Below is a short description of my professional and education background.

work.title: Team Lead - Principal Solutions Engineer
work.description: Top performing Solutions Engineer in 2018 & 2019, closing highest total revenue and volume of new customers. Subset of customers won in 2019 include AMC Networks, Mars, Reverb, and Restaurant Brands International (Burger King, Popeyeâ€™s, and Tim Hortons). Reduced onboarding time for new Solutions Engineers over 40% by creating enablement framework that was leveraged for all Technical Services team members and the basis of enabling new Account Executives.

work.title: Global, Dr Tech Services and Support
work.description: Grew Tech Services team from 3 members to 12 members over 3 years, while reducing ramp time to under 90 days. Analyzed Global Desk support ticket data, identifying trends that evened distribution of workload across team, automated 20% of responses, and maintained an average support ticket lifetime of less than 4 hours.
